data.title: Albert King Chronicle - Their Greatest Stax Hits US Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: ALBERT KING / LITTLE MILTON Chronicle - Their Greatest Stax Hits (1979 US 13-track LP, a collection of classic contemporary blues tracks, this album features one side devoted to each artist. The sleeve remains in its hype stickered shrink wrapwith light wear to the opening edge, whilst the vinyl shows the lightest signs of play leaving this copy excellent! STX-4123) Tracklisting & Info: ALBERT KING 1. Can't You See What You're Doing To Me 2. Everybody Wants To Ge To Heaven 3. Angel Of Mercy 4. I'll Play The Blues For You 5. Breaking Up Somebody's Home 6. That's What The Blues Is All About LITTLE MILTON 7. If That Ain't A Reason 8. That's What Love Will Make You Do 9. What It Is 10. Tin Pan Alley 11. Behind Closed Doors 12. Let Me Back In 13. If You Talk In Your Sleep Year of Release - 1979 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - Stax Catalogue No - STX-4123 Country of Origin - USA Availability - In Stock

ALBERT KING / LITTLE MILTON Chronicle - Their Greatest Stax Hits (1979 US 13-track LP, a collection of classic contemporary blues tracks, this album features one side devoted to each artist. The sleeve remains in its hype stickered shrink wrapwith light wear to the opening edge, whilst the vinyl shows the lightest signs of play leaving this copy excellent! STX-4123)
